problem_text: Use the figure to find the indicated variable. Find y if m \angle 3 = 4 y + 30 and m \angle 7 = 7 y + 6.
compact_text: Use the figure to find the indicated variable. Find y if m \angle 3 = 4y+30 and m \angle 7 = 7y+6.
annotat_text: Use the figure to find the indicated variable. Find $y$ if $m \angle 3 = 4y + 30$ and $m \angle 7 = 7y + 6$.
